snippet: When President Obama’s inaugural planners released the names of donors on Friday, only a handful of companies were on the list of several hundred contributors.
abstract: Pres Obama had drawn criticism for allowing unlimited corporate donations to finance his inaugural festivities, but only handful of companies are on list of several hundred contributors released by his inaugural planners.
lead_paragraph: When President Obama’s inaugural planners released the names of donors on Friday, only a handful of companies were on the list of several hundred contributors.
